name: Forget The Filler Lip Plumper Line Smoothing Gloss
about: What it is: A clinically tested, ultra-shiny gloss with immediate and long-term softening, hydrating, and visibly plumping benefits...Highlighted Ingredients:.- MAXI-LIP™: Scientifically and clinically shown to visibly increase lip volume by 40 percent..- Shea Butter: Hydrates and soothes the lips..- Rosehip Oil: Makes lips feel pillowy soft...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free and vegan...What Else You Need to Know: This clean lip gloss feels wonderful to apply with a plush applicator that luxuriously hugs your lips. Immediately, lips feel comforted and appear ultra-shiny and smooth with less-visible lines and signs of irritation. With consistent use, this gloss is shown to visibly increase lip volume and decrease lines...The oversized doe has curves and then some. The size of the vial accommodates its plush size. When the doe is removed from the vial, it appears less full. The total amount of product in the vial is 3.3 mL as is written on the packaging, but the vial is big—just like the doe and just like your lips, when you use the product...Clinical Results:.Based on an independent study on the specific ingredient complex, MAXI-LIP™, it’s clinically proven to:.- Improve lip condition +100%.- Improve lip softness and comfort +70%.- Improve lip hydration +60%...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -MAXI-LIP™: Scientifically and clinically shown to visibly increase lip volume by 40 percent..-Shea Butter: Hydrates and soothes the lips. .-Hyaluronic Acid: Makes lips feel pillowy soft...Polybutene, Polyglyceryl-2 Tetraisostearate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Methylstyrene/Indene Copolymer, Synthetic Beeswax, Isostearyl Isostearate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Water, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Fragrance, Octyldodecanol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Menthoxypropanediol, Capsicum Frutescens Fruit Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Silica, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Nicotinate, Tribehenin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Rosa Canina Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sorbitan Isostearate Tocopheryl Acetate, Tin Oxide, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Phenoxyethanol, Lactic Acid. May Contain: Peut contenir : Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to clean lips and wear solo as a nearly clear, ultra-shiny gloss. .-Apply on top of lipstick to add glass-like shine to your favorite shade (while getting the visible plumping benefits of the gloss). .-Apply before bed to benefit while you sleep.

I can happily say this does have a plumping effect And no stinging. It has a cooling minty sensation that isn’t unpleasant. It’s also fairly long lasting which was impressive. I do wish the applicator was a little bigger but otherwise this is a repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I found while using this that it stayed on my lips for hours, which I loved. It doesnt give a super glossy look and almost dries down to adhere to the lip without getting sticky. Wears very nice throughout the day as well, every once and a while you can smack your lips and still feel a generous amount of it on and it stays silky and smooth. Almost like it clings to your lips. When applying it does feel thick however, which I got used to very quick but was hard to enjoy. I bought the cherry vanilla, and it has a very subtle scent, which was great because you dont smell it all day. Almost like a cherry bubblegum. After a few moments when you apply you can feel a slight cooling sensation on your lips that doesn't burn. It also has a different type of applicator which I thought I would love but it grabs way too much product for myself personally, and then everything gets messy when I try and put some back. The bottle didn't spill when I let it bounce around in my purse which is a plus but it also came half full due to the shape of the bottle and applicator (with the wand in the bottle it looks full, but when you remove it there is very little product in the bottle). I've also used this when my lips were cracked and it hasn't bothered my skin at all, but I wouldn't call it 'nourishing'. 0 colour payoff. All in all, it's a very basic and boring gloss and I'm not sure it's worth $34 but I also didn't hate it. If it was cheaper I think it would be a lot more worth it for what it is and does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.  The great thing about this plumper is the applicator. I love how the wand is curved so that it contours to your lips for an even application.  It does tingle a bit when applied but that feeling goes go away after 5 minutes or so. I did notice that my lips looked fuller in about 5-10 minutes.  The formula is not sticky and glides on smoothly.  It wore well by itself for more than 4 hours.  I normally hate lip plumpers and avoid them because they make my lips look too puffy but this one wasn’t bad and gave my lips a fuller look without it looking un natural.  I got the color Lavender Sorbet which is a pretty lavender pastel pink color. Definitely worth a try if you are looking for a glossy lip plumper.

It smoothed out my lip lines and made my lips feel bigger. However, I repurchased in the shade Cherry Vanilla and as much as I love the product, I am beyond disappointed. The bottle came less than half full. One use and there is barely any product left in the tube. The tube also doesn’t seem to twist completely closed on this one. Maybe I got a bad bottle but other reviews show that there is barely any product immediately after opening. I didn’t think this was an issue with my first purchase, but maybe the quality has gone down. For $26 I probably can not justify buying a product that is barely full, as much as I love it. I will be on the lookout for something else that’s similar.

Super light pink. I wanted to wear this without makeup, but this is definitely one I have to wear with makeup or liner, it has a chalky kind of color. It also didn’t remove all the lines from my lips, which isn’t a huge deal to me. But this is bothersome for the price. I was waiting for the mail like a kid waiting for candy, but this candy was more like coal.

reviews.review_title: can’t believe i lived without it!!!

I thought people were exaggerating in their comments when they said it’s half full. My photo today is literally brand new, just took the top off and took a photo. That being said… I bought this after already knowing it’s a problem after buying my first color, so clearly I still came back for more. I just wish I didn’t like the product so much because this is almost laughable.

reviews.review_title: Great product, but not worth it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There isn't enough product in here! I love the gloss itself. It lasts, one coat suffices, the smell is good, it tingles but doesn't burn, the color is opaque, and it's pretty hydrating for me. However I had to take off 3 stars just for the packaging/amount. All the comments saying it's not filled all the way are right. The applicator is wide so it allows it to get the gloss on the sides. But, it picks up so much product that most of it stays stuck right below the stopper. I don't use it much (average twice a day) and I feel like I'll be out within the next month. Mind you, I bought this 2 weeks ago. The applicator is also shorter than the bottle so it can't reach a quarter of the product at the bottom. If the applicator was longer and the product was filled to the top, I'd repurchase. If you have $26 to spend, I def recommend. But if you want something that will last you a while, this aint the one.

reviews.review_text: I love this product.  Wonderful color, plumping and shine.  I go through it quickly is the only downfall.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Velvet - rosy mauve with plummy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the Sephora Favorites; Clean Me Up Kit, and when I took it out of the bag, the bottle looked only half full! it was so weird, I thought it was used or something.. but after reading some comments I guess I wasnt the only one that felt that way! I get that they cant fill the gloss all the way up cause then it will spill out or not be able to close, but at the same time it kind of looked caked on inside and the tube was not even half full..maybe bad batch? So Im not really a plump lip gloss girly, (why its nice to get the kits so you can try new things!) buuuuut for a first timer I felt like it wasnt too intense and I felt like it was a good gateway into plumping glosses if you wanna start getting into them. I did like the colour too. For a first timer it was not bad experience, just the packaging/filling is a bit of a down side. Might try another colour in the future

reviews.review_title: GREAT GLOSS BUT NOT A RE-PURCHASE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re looking for a plumper…this is not it but I’m not for a plumper I don’t like them so lucky me. However, my issue is that the bottle is empty and so are the jumbo. great product but their cheapness will. be their downfall

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Same as the other reviewers . Purchased it on the VIB Sale dates and it looks like it’s already half empty upon arrival ! Why ? The HAUS labs one for example and clarins is full upon arrival . Smh  returning

reviews.review_title: Not for the price, sorry. Empty in two weeks!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love her… BUT I got her two weeks ago and the tube looks almost empty. Granted “she thicc” and you really don’t need much.. but for $26… fenty gloss lasts me FOREVER for $5 less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this on a recent Sephora Favorites kit and it is truly underwhelming. There is no color at all, there is no plumping at all. It’s basically an overpriced regular lip gloss that does not even hold for 30 minutes. I will stick to Too faced or Milano

reviews.review_title: Don’t believe TikTok! Skip this gloss!
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I fell for the hype on TikTok and was disappointed. For the high price point, this should have blown me away. The color is nice but immediately when I pulled out the wand, I felt like the bottle was half way filled. I thought I was sent a used one! That is until I saw the reviews and saw that lots of people posted about how little product you get. Lesson learned, always read the reviews. It doesn’t too much plumping and smoothing either, it feels no different from a regular gloss. Some cooling effect, but nothing else. Save your money and the hassle of a return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was influenced by Paloma on TikTok and she did not steer me wrong! 10/10 best lipgloss ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells AMAZING, like I want to eat it lol. It is also such a pretty cool toned Barbie pink color that you can put on sheer or build up the color, not patchy. It’s my favorite at the moment for every day!

LOVE this gloss. I use this alone in the morning to look fresh or over lipstick for a glassy shine. It is thicker but lasts well. The plumping effect is great. The mini size is super cute and is great for keeping in my belt bag

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss is half empty and the applicator is weirdly shaped grabbing a lot of product. Not much plumping either just a cooling effect. Just looks like a basic gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this during the Sephora sale…returning! The bottle is half empty, and it’s brand new!!! Please save your money. Hardly any product, doesn’t plump, just minty and super sticky. Don’t buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss is on the sticky side and has a very strong scent which I didn’t enjoy. It doesn’t smooth the lines on my lips and looks like any other gloss. I will be returning it.

reviews.review_title: Half the size of an average cheaper gloss…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a set and it is really nice but only 3ml of product is crazy for 26$!! small little companys need to stop acting like they are Chanel… i cannot believe their jumbo size is 38$ for 7ml of product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I loved this less given you don’t get a lot in each bottle but I love it so and will continue to repurchase for as long as it’s available. I am not big on lip color, it tends to end up on my nose or chin (so charming) so this is perfect in Glazed and, more recently, Annie. Subtle color, lots of shine, and while I don’t notice a plumping effect I do think it hydrates my lips nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: An amazing lip gloss that stays over the lines on your mouth, and does not burn like a lip plumping formula. My fav item out of the Clean Me Up favorites kit I got during the Sephora sale. Probably

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Cherry Vanilla - a sheer cherry
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing special. The bottle is literally half full, it’s sticky and goopy! Was excited to try this since it was raved all over TikTok but ended up with a mediocre sticky gloss. Will be returning this gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Proves influencers are just cash cows.  Bought this because this girl raved about it.  This is trash.  Nothing in the container except a tiny amount of product.  Great concept though.  Very disappointed and sending back

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love it because of the colour and how it comes off online but sadly I feel the exact opposite!! The colour is really nice but it is sooo thick and sticky, and it almost feels clumpy when its been on for a bit. I felt no difference to my lips and actually wanted to take a wet wipe and wipe it off because of how unpleasant it felt. I saw absolutely no changes the moisture of my lips if anything they felt better without it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While this gloss is AMAZING, color and formula, there is an issue with packaging, i have a couple of colors in this and after 1 use, there must have been an air bubble in the tube because its over half way gone.  This is too expensive to have that issue unfortunately.

reviews.review_title: Too expensive for too little product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product but I cannot recommend to people or purchase again until they give more product at the same price or lower the price. I went through all my glosses and this is the one with the least amount of product and it has one of the highest price tags

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shade is absolutely perfect! It’s a perfect nude and isnt very sticky. It’s a nice formula and I would def buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the plumping effect doesn't work (this might just be a me thing). it's a good gloss though and the colour and smell are so good. (the bottle can be decieving as you won't get very many uses out of it)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am forever and always a lipgloss girlie and when I say this is the best plumping lipgloss I have ever tried, it means something. Doesn’t feel “minty” and is the perfect thickness without being sticky. Obsessed is an understatement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I thought I was confused when my daisy pink shade ran out, but I was right! This product is unfortunately extremely deceiving. It’s a good gloss but you won’t get more than 10/15 uses

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss it’s so hydrating, it fills in my lip lines and has such a pretty color. The one thing I HATE is how little product is given—I had it for four days and it is already halfway empty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it but down fall here is u barely get any product for what u pay for. I think there’s better alternatives for this one. Smells really good just don’t think If ur looking for something to last u a long time don’t  think this is it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I just recently purchased it And I got to say I’ve never gotten a lip gloss that is so thick and sticky. The color is pretty, but it feels so heavy on your lips and it’s just very messy and sticky for me. I like lip glosses that are soft and not sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: ugh! i wanna give this 5 stars bc it’s so good and juicy and shiny but there is literally nothing in the tube. i thought ppl were being dramatic but wow

reviews.review_title: Does what it says it will do!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The lip gloss is a beautiful color and fills in the lines on my lips perfectly. I was happy with the result

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product a while ago and finally decided to get it during the sale, so I got a brand new lip gloss and the bottle is basically empty! save your money. Some drugstores glosses are just as good and at least you get a full bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: nothing special. i personally am not a huge fan of the smell and the plumping is VERY minimal. however it is a very pretty color. just kind of disappointed in the product itself :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Probably won’t buy this product again, loved the consistency and color, just not my go to wasn’t much of a temporary plump and there is no stopper in it, product leaks out and grabs too much as yore trying to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Velvet is a beautiful cool mauvey (not too cool though) dream. Color is so pretty and this lipgloss is the perfect lipgloss in every way. It’s substantial and lasts but is not goopy. Plumps but doesn’t burn. Buy them all! You won’t regret it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this lip gloss. It plumps and smooths lips and doesn’t burn. It’s beautiful and lasts longer than average. It’s a little thicker than average but in a good way. This color George is the beige neutral of dreams.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very pretty cherry shade, a bit translucent. Very minor tingling sensation if you are not into a full on plumping feeling you will like this one. It is very shiny. Also on the more sticky side.

reviews.review_title: A must have for those dry lips.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, it is very hydrating which in return adds plumpness to the lips naturally as it is hydrating   Them as well as a plumping affect with the ingredient. It’s more of a menthol Icy feeling, so it’s great for the more sensative girlys

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Cherry Vanilla - a sheer cherry
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: makes my dry lips so hydrated and so good. And you can never go wrong with this color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: 3 stars not because the actual gloss is bad but because of the amount of product in the tube. The cherry vanilla smells so good and I really like it but I haven’t even had this a full month and it looks empty. The little product you do get builds up on the stick part of the wand and makes a mess. I expected a lot more product for the price, so although I like it, I don’t LOVE it enough to repurchase.
To sell something this small for $15. This is a free sample at best and even then I would find if too small. Also the product smells like every other lip plumper I have ever tried.

reviews.review_title: Must have beige pinky nude gloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely the best beige pinky nude gloss. I like pairing it with the GXVE over lining lip liner in Do whatever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is just a very thick lip gloss. It didn't plump for me at all and wears off quick. Not a fan and won't repurchase, but I did like the applicator.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just bought this product during the rouge sale and without opening it, the bottle was half way empty.. I thought it was used until I read the reviews.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I won’t be repurchasing. I find myself reapplying this more than other glosses. The applicator pulls too much product at a time. You also get half the product of most other lip glosses at this price. ￼￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased this lip gloss during the rouge sale and I love the formula but for $26 there is not a lot product :((( I have used it 3 times now and the tube is halfway empty

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Cherry Vanilla - a sheer cherry
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how the gloss looks, it also smells really good. Giving it a 3/5 because of how little product is in this lipgloss. I’ve probably used it about four times …

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: lawless just earned a life time customer because I fell in love with this gloss. When looking for a gloss I need something that is NOT sticky and actually hydrates, wears long and doesn't dissappear in 20 minutes, and has a beautiful color range. I also loved the cooling sensation you get when wearing this, doesn't burn or tingle just feels cool. Gonna need every shade now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in a Sephora favorites set and I love it! Smooths my lips out and gives a super glassy effect. I don’t find it sticky at all. Just wish it was a little cheaper.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my lip products
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was amazing worked wonders my lips have never looked better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: perfect everyday muted baby pink to pair with a cool tone lip liner ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really disappointed in how this gloss felt, it’s extremely goopy, and feels almost slimy and thick in all the worst ways. I was sucked in through the scent, but was swiftly disappointed when i bought it and applied it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it looks pretty on the lips but I saw no plumping, it just feels minty/tingley onthe lips

reviews.review_title: BEST LIP GLOSS I EVER TRIED
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best best best fomula i have ever tried. Idk what yall put in this but CHEFS KISSS.y favorite from product from lawless.!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to give this more stars but the fact that there is SO LITTLE product in the tube, made me give it 3 stars. The product itself I love but the skimpy amount inside is a total ripoff. I Love all Lawless products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The gloss is okay, a little tacky, not the best I’ve tried. Packaging looks great, until you pull out the applicator and notice the very little amount of product inside. Fenty Beauty Heat gloss is way better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite gloss I wear it almost every day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this on in the store and was completely surprised how beautiful the color Daisy Pink is. The moment we got to the car I tried it on and it didn’t disappoint. Plumping with gorgeous color! Getting more!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosy Outlook - super sheer baby pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite plumper! It’s not too tingly and perfect color over any shade :))

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It did not plump my lips in anyway and it more just cooled my lips down. I don’t really know what else to say

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Juicy Watermelon - sheer watermelon
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this gloss on a whim and I’m so happy I did!  It is very thick and sticky which gives it good staying power (because careful with long hair on windy days). It also hydrates pretty good. I have used other brands of these thick glosses that have caused my lips to get extremely dry.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Cherry Vanilla - a sheer cherry
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! So hydrating and such a cooling effect and the color is juste WOW love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this! I’m a sucker for any milky pink gloss, which in my opinion is hard to pull off without either being too sheer or kinda uneven in color. This too me is perfect & im already buying a backup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s moisturizing and plumping, which is rare to have both in one gloss! I prefer this over lip injection. It’s more wearable and prettier on its own

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was nervous to try this because I find lip plumpers to be irritating and painful, but this is a subtle cooling peppermint feeling. It is comfortable and moisturizing. Not sure how much it plumps, but I enjoy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful! The pigment is so great! I plan on buying more. Plump that doesn’t irritate my lips (so far).
